H0.text: Players form scrums in which sport. American Football

H1.text: Players form scrums in which sport. Hockey

H2.text: Players form scrums in which sport. Lacrosse

H3.text: Players form scrums in which sport. Rugby

A4.text: A scrummage, commonly known simply as a scrum, is a method of restarting play in rugby football.

A5.text: Scrums occur more often, and are now of greater importance, in union than in league.
